action.msg: Is there any reason why we're in the melon patch, of all places?
Oh y'know, I'm just hungry.
That's a lie.
We've been walking through this melon patch for like ten minutes.
You could've easily picked the first few we've seen.
But you decided to keep walking, and continuously change discussion topics. So lemme ask again-
What's the reason for bringing us here, Fever?
Okay, so maybe I just needed to get away from town.
Aww. I get it, babe. You should've just said that.
Bruh like- you wouldn't imagine the fucking week I had.
Two weeks, actually.
Oh yeah, right. You were there. Looking all cute and shit.
Here comes the compliments.
It's true! You're super cute! Hot, even!
Ugh, no you~.
You know, now that we're pretty far from town, with NO one here to watch us, there IS something that we could do...
Oh yeah?
How about we-
BRUH, you okay?
Fucking- yeah I'm fine. Stupid ass harder-than-usual melon...
Huh? Was that you?
What? I thought that was you.
I don't have a british accent.
Yo! Down here!
Also I'm AUSTRALIAN, not bri'ish!
Is that a talking melon.
British? Australian? What do those even me-
Yeah! This is where I live. The hell were you guys about to do in front of me and my mates?
Probably make out. I dunno, depends on how long we were gonna go.
Is no one gonna tell me-
Ya'll are really doin that kinda shit in a melon patch?
Where we do that is NONE of your business!
Dudes, this is MY melon patch.
Never mind that, I see you have a microphone. Wanna sing?
Oh right. Why did I bring that here? Also, you have one too?
Yeah. It can get boring here sometimes, so I decided to pick up a hobby.
Well then, fine. Just one song- after that, I'm getting back to making out with my girl!
So no one's gonna answer my-
